snippet: Frustrated by a lack of progress over a new contract, about 92 percent of union members said yes to a possible walkout as early as the fall.
abstract: Professional Staff Congress, union representing City University of New York workers, says CUNY faculty members and employees have overwhelmingly voted to authorize strike in event mediator is unable to broker deal with university administration; state law makes it illegal for public employees to strike.
lead_paragraph: Frustrated by a lack of progress over a new contract, about 92 percent of union members said yes to a possible walkout as early as the fall.

headline.main: CUNY Union Votes to Allow Strike if Contract Deal Is Not Reached
headline.print_headline: CUNY Union Votes to Authorize Strike if Deal Is Not Reached
